forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
